body:
Watching $AAPL closely on the 4HR time frame, As you see the 9/21 ema (Blue9 Yellow21) lines are at a crossing point where it's "make or break" whether we switch into a bearish trend back down towards the 200EMA (Red Line). Friday was also an "inside Day" which stands for a day that traded within the range of the previous day (Thursday). What usually follows an inside day is a major move when the range of the day is broken.

Watching for a break of Fridays high, or Fridays low for an entry for calls or puts.
